description:
Aspose.Pdf for .NET is a PDF document creation and manipulation component that enables your .NET applications to read, write and manipulate existing PDF documents without using Adobe Acrobat. It also allows you to create forms and manage form fields embedded in a PDF document. This component is written in managed C# and it allows developers to add PDF creation and manipulation functionality to their Microsoft .NET applications (WinForms, ASP.NET and .NET Compact Framework).
        Aspose.Pdf for .NET is affordable and offers an incredible wealth of features including PDF compression options; table creation and manipulation; support for graph objects; extensive hyperlink functionality; extended security controls; custom font handling; integration with data sources; add or remove bookmarks; create table of contents; add, update, delete attachments and annotations; import or export PDF form data; add, replace or remove text and images; split, concatenate, extract or inset pages; transform pages to image; print PDF documents and much more.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	
Features
PDFNEWNET-40065	Support PDF/A_2U format

Enhancements
PDFNEWNET-39316	PDF optimization size issue
PDFNEWNET-37901	File Optimization for web size difference between Adobe and Aspose.Pdf
PDFNET-41799	PDFA Validation error list
PDFNET-41722	XML to PDF: BindXml constructors with stream
PDFNET-41488	XML to PDF: Hyperlink text rendering issue

Execeptions
PDFNEWNET-39412	Exception when setting XmpPdfAExtensionValueType to PDF file
PDFNEWNET-39161	OutOfMemory exception when using OptimizeResources(..) method
PDFNET-41745	PDF to PDFA conversion is throwing unhandled exception
PDFNET-41649	PDF to PDFA conversion throws NullReference Exception
PDFNET-41595	Watermark exception when page content overflows

Bugs
PDFNET-41662	PDF to PDFA conversion rotates images, but working fine in 11.2.0
PDFNET-41655	PDF to PDF/A - Images get distorted
PDFNET-41623	Text Replacement regression issue in 16.10.0
PDFNET-41687	When PDF is converted to HTML, the resulting HTML file has long scrollbars in Microsoft Edge.
PDFNET-41680	When PDF document is converted to XPS, the second page shows "This page cannot be displayed" message.
PDFNET-41619	Failed to load Tex file from stream
PDFNET-41542	When PDF is saved as DOCX, System hangs and CPU goes high.
PDFNEWNET-39368	PDF to PDF/A - resultant file size gets 17 times of the original PDF size
PDFNEWNET-40418	PDF to TIFF - Blank images are not being skipped
PDFNEWNET-39544	PDF to PDF/A - Resultant file is large size
PDFNEWNET-39399	PDF to PDF/A - Resultant file contents get corrupted
PDFNET-41104	PDF to PDF/A - Formatting issues in resultant file
PDFNEWNET-40765	PDF to HTML: heading text characters render incorrectly
PDFNEWNET-40674	Non-Searchable PDF is converted to incorrect Searchable PDF
PDFNEWNET-40538	PDF to PDFA conversion results invalid output
PDFNEWNET-39076	API throws NullReferenceException upon loading a PDF document
PDFNEWNET-38850	PDF file is not being optimized
PDFNEWNET-38814	PDF to PPTX: Space between words increased
PDFNEWNET-38812	PDF to PPTX: text alignment issue
PDFNET-41352	PDF to DOCX: text alignment issue in table row
PDFNET-41350	PDF to DOCX: bullets and assoicated text alignment issue
PDFNET-41661	PDF to PPTX - Line spacing is lost and the data is not rendering correctly
PDFNET-41531	PDF to DOCX: Paragraph indent values are not retained
PDFNET-41354	PDF to PDF/A - Highlight box hides the image in PDF
PDFNET-41068	Editing PDF document overlaps text characters
PDFNET-41854	In evaluation mode only, dispose method throws IndexOutOfRangeException
PDFNET-41457	API throws ArgumentException while resizing PDF document without setting license
PDFNET-41901	PDF to PDF/A - Resultant file gets corrupted (error on openning and missing content)
PDFNEWNET-38182	Text replace changes text position
PDFNEWNET-40139	PDF with hieroglyphs is converted to the JPEG with corrupted symbols
PDFNET-41356	PDF to PDF/A - Resultant file is not compliant
PDFNET-41714	When PDF converted to PDF_A_1B, the document has glyphs missing in embedded fonts error
summary: Aspose.Pdf for .NET is an amazing component which provides the feature to create and manipulate PDF documents.
title: Aspose.Pdf for .NET
